TEXT.TITLE: WESTERN MINING SELLS ACM STAKE
TEXT.BODY: Western Mining Corp Holdings Ltd <WMNG.S> (WMC) said it sold its entire holding of 22.13 mln shares in the gold mining company <Australian Consolidated Minerals Ltd> (ACM). WMC gave no details, but stockbrokers said the sale was made at eight dlrs a share on Friday to a number of U.S., European and Australian investors through WMC's usual brokers. The company purchased the 19.9 pct parcel in early March from Amax Inc <AMX.N> at 6.32 dlrs a share ahead of a one-for-three bonus issue when Amax sold its entire 47 pct stake in ACM to a number of local companies. REUTER
